attributes.action: resign due to the continuous deaths in the armed forces as in my opinion are mainly his responsibility
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In my opinion Gordon Brown has screwed down the finances for the armed forces so they are not supplied with the latest equipment. MOD bought US Scrapped vehicles ,Insufficient Air Power/Support. I suggest he has a Snatch Landrover & give his bomb proof Jag to the Military

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
